name: azuread-app-permissions-pipeline-extension
description: Extensions to set app roles and oauth permissions to an App Registration

scripts.pack: npm run packtasks && cross-var tfx extension create --manifests vss-extension.json --output-path dist
scripts.bumpversion: cross-var node version.js -v $npm_package_version && cross-var node version.js -v $npm_package_version -d vss-extension.json -p version
scripts.publish: npm run bumpversion && npm run pack && cross-var tfx extension publish --manifests vss-extension.json --share-with rubix-gav edulimavsts --output-path dist

author: eduardo.lima@dtidigital.com.br
